MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont AddFont(bool obfuscate) cil managed
Public Function AddFont (obfuscate As Boolean) As XpsFont

param.name: obfuscate
param.span: 如果要对字体进行模糊处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to obfuscate the font; otherwise, .

summary.span: 将一个经过模糊处理的新 添加到当前页中。

span.span: Adds a new obfuscated to the current page.
The new font resource that was added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加新具有到文档包中的可选模糊处理并将其关联与当前。 adds a new with optional obfuscation to the document package and associates it with the current . 设置`obfuscate`参数`true`您何时进行模糊处理许可的专有字体法律义务。Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font. 而模糊处理对字体不加密，但它会抑制解压缩专有字体和用于其他用途单独安装。While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses. 有关字体模糊处理的详细信息，请参阅部分 2.1.7.3"嵌入字体模糊处理"中*XML 纸张规范 (XPS)* 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法，以向页面添加字体资源。The following example shows how to use the method in order to add a font resource to a page. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

span.span: has been called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加新有可选模糊处理或限制到文档包中，并将其关联与当前。 adds a new with optional obfuscation or restrictions to the document package, and associates it with the current . 设置`obfuscate`参数`true`您何时进行模糊处理许可的专有字体法律义务。Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font. 而模糊处理对字体不加密，但它会抑制解压缩专有字体和用于其他用途单独安装。While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses. 有关字体模糊处理和受限制的字体使用的详细信息请参阅*XML 纸张规范 (XPS)* 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about font obfuscation and the use of restricted fonts see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法，将字体资源添加到页。The following example shows how to use the method to add a font resource to a page.
